text: Tin Cup is a 1996 romantic comedy movie. This movie is about a golf pro. Kevin Costner plays Roy. Rene Russo plays Molly. Cheech Marin plays Romeo. This movie got mixed to positive reviews from the critics. It took in over $75.8 million USD. ==References== Category:1996 romantic comedy movies Category:1990s sports movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Golf movies
title: Tin Cup
